sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import "./App.css"; import ChatAgent from "./components/Shared/ChatAgent"; function App() { const [fontSize, setFontSize] = useState("medium"); const [contrast, setContrast] = useState("normal"); const [textToSpeech, setTextToSpeech] = useState(false); const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState("home"); const [enrolledCourse, setEnrolledCourse] = useState(null); const [playingAudio, setPlayingAudio] = useState(null); const [keyboardLesson, setKeyboardLesson] = useState(null); const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false); const [buttonClicked, setButtonClicked] = useState(""); const handleSpeak = (text) => { if (textToSpeech) { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(text); utterance.rate = 0.9; window.speechSynthesis.cancel(); window.speechSynthesis.speak(utterance); } }; const pythonVisuals = { title: "Python Basics", content: `

Python Data Types

Strings: "hello"
Numbers: 42, 3.14
Lists: [1, 2, 3]
Dictionaries: {"key": "value"}
Tuples: (1, 2, 3)
Sets: {1, 2, 3}

Control Flow

if/elif/else statements
for loops
while loops
try/except blocks

Functions

def function_name(parameters):
return statements
*args and **kwargs
` }; const webDesignVisuals = { title: "Web Design Fundamentals", content: `

Color Theory

Primary Colors
Secondary Colors
Color Harmony

Layout Principles

Grid Systems
Visual Hierarchy
White Space

Typography

Font Families
Font Pairing
Text Hierarchy
` }; const dataStructuresVisuals = { title: "Data Structures", content: `

Arrays and Lists

Static Arrays
Dynamic Arrays
Linked Lists

Trees

Binary Trees
BST
AVL Trees

Graphs

Directed Graphs
Undirected Graphs
Weighted Graphs
` }; const audioContent = { english: { title: "English Speaking", text: "Welcome to English course. Hello, how are you?" }, business: { title: "Business Communication", text: "In business, we must be professional and clear." }, history: { title: "History Podcast", text: "The Renaissance began in Italy during the 14th century." } }; const playAudio = (audioKey) => { setPlayingAudio(audioKey); const audio = audioContent[audioKey]; const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(audio.text); utterance.rate = 0.9; window.speechSynthesis.cancel(); window.speechSynthesis.speak(utterance); setIsPlaying(true); }; const stopAudio = () => { window.speechSynthesis.cancel(); setIsPlaying(false); setPlayingAudio(null); }; const handleButtonClick = (buttonName) => { setButtonClicked(buttonName); handleSpeak("You clicked " + buttonName); setTimeout(() => setButtonClicked(""), 1000); }; return (

Accessibility Options

{enrolledCourse ? (

{enrolledCourse.title}

) : playingAudio ? (

{audioContent[playingAudio].title}

{audioContent[playingAudio].text}

) : keyboardLesson ? (

{keyboardLesson.title}

{keyboardLesson.description}

{keyboardLesson.id === "tab" && (

How to Use Tab:

Try it! Tab through these buttons:

{buttonClicked &&

{buttonClicked} was activated!

}
)} {keyboardLesson.id === "enter" && (

Enter Key Usage:

Practice pressing Enter on focused buttons:

{buttonClicked &&

{buttonClicked} was activated!

}
)} {keyboardLesson.id === "arrow" && (

Arrow Keys:

Try selecting from this dropdown:

)} {keyboardLesson.id === "space" && (

Space Bar Usage:

Try checking these boxes with Space:

)}
) : currentPage === "home" ? ( <>

Educational Recommender

Personalized Learning for Everyone

) : currentPage === "dashboard" ? (

Welcome to Learning Dashboard

Choose your learning method:

{/* VISUAL LEARNING */} {/* AUDIO SUPPORT */} {/* KEYBOARD NAVIGATION */} {/* HIGH CONTRAST */}
) : currentPage === "visual" ? (

Visual Learning

Python Basics

Learn Python with visual diagrams

Web Design

Colors & design principles

Data Structures

Learn fundamental data structures

) : currentPage === "audio" ? (

Audio Support

English Speaking

Learn English greetings

Business Communication

Professional communication

) : currentPage === "keyboard" ? (

Keyboard Navigation

Tab Key

Navigate through elements

Enter Key

Activate buttons & select

) : currentPage === "contrast" ? (

High Contrast & Visibility

High Contrast Mode

Enable high contrast colors

Dark Mode

Reduce eye strain

) : null}
); } export default App;
